title: if you're building athenes on any mage
body:
with the exception of{{champion:3}} 

you're doing it wrong. why spend 2k+ gold on an item with sup-bar ap and sub-par mana regen when you can just build {{item:3040}}, ward often, and watch your positioning?

once you get it fully stacked thats 1k bonus mana, AND a shield worth 20% of your current mana. odds are that shield and any other shield/flash will keep you safe from all death.


every time i see a lux, velkoz, or any other poke/siege mage build{{item:3174}} first instead of {{item:3070}} {{item:1058}} i die on the inside.


aside from a few AP mids, most can go with the general build of {{item:3003}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3135}}, and put out much more damage and contribute much more to the game.



athenes is basically the item that says "oh i suck and keep eating shit from my lane opponent and stupidly use my mana"
morellos is only good against high sustain mids{{champion:8}} {{champion:50}} 


archangels staff always.


edit; mana pots are 35g each people. you can buy 3 mana pots and that's enough to get up to 150 bonus mana from your tear before you have to back again.

2) It doesn't give cdr-do you know how many times me or anyone else that plays lol woulda gotten a kill or gotten away if a skill came up .5s sooner? We do. And I like getting the kill tyvm. Its better than letting them get away

5) The shield you say is completely useless till late game. Only once you've casted a ton of spells does the item upgrade and give you the shield.

If EVERYONE builds AHG-there's probably a reason they're doing it. I myself used to buy morellos instead but, like I've mentioned, while also getting a kill, I almost always died. Then someone said "wtf, athenes gives you all this PLUS MR and extra mana regen." so I tried it out and look at that! Still living! I rock!

Build athenes and DONT build AA's staff.

like i said. athenes is for the clumsy dumb mages who waste their mana a lot and take too much harass from their lane opponents. 

seraphs embrace is essentially a 400 health shield, with 3% of your 2k mana going into your ap, and 40 more ap than athenes. 

run some scaling cdr quints and glyphs and that 20% cdr from athenes is WASTED.

If you're losing against another AP mid and need the earlier mana regen and MR to farm safely without feeding, then Athene's is the best possible option.

You're the kind of tard who will feed a Syndra early cause you "weren't expecting that much damage!" Or you blame the jungler ofc, then build a fucking needlessly large rod or tear first, gaining nothing that will help you in a highly abusive ranged mage mid who is already ahead of you.  Then the game is over before you've even managed to stack your late game item with no defenses and you're 0-7.

The usefulness of items changes every game and every match up, even the same champs matched up will result in different items based on the way the game progresses, only a bronze scrub buys the same things every single time and disregards everything else.

why would you waste the gold building seraphs on champs who really don't need it? blitz needs tear. anivia needs tear, or nidalee (most just go roa on her these days though)

lux, ori, vel, etc. need the CDR, the mana regen, and the MR. what kills ME is seeing mid lanes getting wrecked by other mages and building morello's with no MR, when grail gives the MR plus better mana regen.
Seraphs is unnecessary.

I die inside when i see someone waste that much gold when they could've been more efficient with their spendings.
